projectGridLines.title: Full Stack Engineer (AI Domain)
projectGridLines.description:
We are looking for skilled Full-Stack Software Developers to

build dynamic applications that enable seamless interaction

with AI outputs in a robust, scalable environment. In this role,

you will:

• Design and implement backend services with Python, Django,

and PostgreSQL, following industry-standard system design

practices.


• Deploy and scale AI models on AWS using Docker, with auto-

scaling setups for optimised efficiency and reliability.


• Develop interactive frontends for AI data consumption using

React, TypeScript, and Next.js.

• Deploy and optimize deep learning models across platforms,

including cloud, edge, and IoT, ensuring high performance on

the latest edge devices.

Key Technologies: React, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python,

Django, PyTorch, Next.js, Linux, AWS, Docker, PostgreSQL

Note: Refer hyperlinks for product description. (Or visit our

website www.qure.ai to explore more)

Good experience in any programming language and strong

analytical skills. Having a good foundation in mathematics is a

plus.Communication, presentation and team working skills At least two courses in core computer sciences (DSA, OOPs,

DBMS, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture) and at least

one course with grade higher than B.Should have strong interest in developing software.1. Full-Stack Development: Hands-on experience with modern

front-end and backend development using React, TypeScript,

Python, and Django.

2. Cloud and DevOps: Cloud deployment with AWS and Docker,

including CI/CD, scaling, and monitoring.

3. AI Model Deployment: Techniques for deploying and

optimizing AI models across cloud, edge, and IoT platforms.

4. Hybrid Compute: Experience balancing resources across

cloud and edge environments.

5. Healthcare AI: Exposure to large-scale healthcare data,

emphasizing reliability, security, data privacy and compliance.

6. Collaboration in AI Engineering: Working alongside data

scientists to bring AI models to production.
